mapper.select: SELECT * FROM faq_category ORDER BY no ASC
SELECT f.no, f.categoryNo, c.name AS categoryName, f.title, f.content, f.createdAt, f.updatedAt, f.imgUrl FROM faq f LEFT JOIN faq_category c ON f.categoryNo = c.no ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq (category, title, content, imgUrl) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgUrl})
INSERT INTO faq (categoryNo, title, content, imgUrl) VALUES (#{categoryNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET categoryNo = #{categoryNo}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, imgUrl = #{imgUrl}, updatedAt = now() WHERE no = #{no}
